works.description:
I am writing this letter because  I   
found  copyright pictures in a blog.  Could you  please give attention and  
priority to this letter and remove the  pictures  URGENTLY because the  
publication of these pictures in those groups are  creating big problems in  
my relationship with my wife.

These photos include sensual and erotic contents, and which were stolen  
from our  computers.  These pictures belong to us and are of private  
matter, and this is the reason why  I am asking to remove these photos.

Therefore, I ask for your help in removing these pictures from  theseblogs,  
since the photos are causing a great  embarrassment for my wife and I and  
also causing serious problems in our  relationship.  I should like if you  
can resolve this problem urgently.

My username in the Google group is:  morenobarra and the e-mail I use for  
this username is:  ksalroka@unisys.com.br

However for communication issues with me, the best e-mail to use is:  
rodney.oei@globo.com


To expedite the process I am following the format suggested in Google’s  
Infringement Notification for Image Research.

1.   Identify in sufficient detail the copyrighted work that you believe  
has been infringed upon.

The Blog that allegedly contains the infringed material that contains the  
pictures are published in the following URLs:
